LanguageData.VME_TerribleLeadershipChallenge.stages.0: That leadership challenge was terrible. Watching it just made people sad. I guess we have a strong leader, at least...
LanguageData.VME_BoringLeadershipChallenge.stages.0.d: That leadership challenge was not good. The fighters wouldn't commit, so there were no exciting moments. At least our leader is the strongest.
LanguageData.VME_GoodLeadershipChallenge.stages.0.des: A good leadership challenge. The fighters went for blood and showed real heart. We now know that our leader is the strongest.
LanguageData.VME_UnforgettableLeadershipChallenge.sta: That leadership challenge was unforgettable! Both fighters gave all they had, and we know that our leader is now the strongest among us!
